channel.description: Recent content in Rails on Andrew Rady

item.title: Connecting Your Rails App to a Database
item.description: Connecting your Rails application to a database #Rails default setup uses sqlite which is a great way to get starting building applications, but at some point we will need to connect to a real database.

item.title: Rails Windows Development
item.description: Rails development on Windows #Developing Rails applications on windows has always been a pain.
